pr_title: Issue #8020: resolve Trailing whitespace violations in test resources

timeline.message: Issue #8020: resolve Trailing whitespace violations in test resources

timeline.bodyText:
You have confirmed these suppressions are needed and cannot be removed since the check and test requires the trailing whitespace for something it is testing?
Can you explain why each needs a trailing whitespace?
timeline.author: rnveach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -66,4 +66,12 @@
   <suppress checks="OuterTypeFilename"
     files="src[\\/]it[\\/]resources[\\/].*[\\/]SuppressionXpathRegressionOuterTypeFilename.*\.java"/>
 
+  <!-- intentional problem for testing -->
+  <suppress checks="RegexpSingleline"
+    files="[\\/]InputJavadocContentLocationTrailingSpace\.java"/>
+  <suppress checks="RegexpSingleline"
+    files="[\\/]InputJavadocParagraphCorrect\.java"/>
+  <suppress checks="RegexpSingleline"
+    files="[\\/]InputJavadocTagContinuationIndentationGuavaFalsePositive\.java"/>

replies.bodyText:
Removing either of them from InputJavadocParagraphCorrect.java results in pitest failure.
I removed one out of the two whitespaces from InputJavadocTagContinuationIndentationGuavaFalsePositive.java
I don't thing it's okay to remove any from InputJavadocContentLocationTrailingSpace.java as the check is for testing the same thing.
replies.author: shashwatj07

timeline.bodyText: You confirmed that there weren't any trailing whitesspaces we could remove? Do any files have more than 1 and maybe pitest will allow us to leave just 1 of them?
timeline.author: rnveach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -66,4 +66,12 @@
   <suppress checks="OuterTypeFilename"
     files="src[\\/]it[\\/]resources[\\/].*[\\/]SuppressionXpathRegressionOuterTypeFilename.*\.java"/>
 
+  <!-- intentional problem for testing -->
+  <suppress checks="RegexpSingleline"
+    files="[\\/]InputJavadocContentLocationTrailingSpace\.java"/>
+  <suppress checks="RegexpSingleline"
+    files="[\\/]InputJavadocParagraphCorrect\.java"/>
+  <suppress checks="RegexpSingleline"
+    files="[\\/]InputJavadocTagContinuationIndentationGuavaFalsePositive\.java"/>

replies.bodyText: I've removed all the whitespaces that were possible.
replies.author: shashwatj07

timeline.message: Issue #8020: resolve Trailing whitespace violations in test resources

timeline.bodyText:
This trailing space on line 11 is necessary as removing it gives a pitest violation.
[WARNING] Rule violated for class com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.javadoc.JavadocTagContinuationIndentationCheck: branches covered ratio is 0.95, but expected minimum is 1.00
timeline.author: shashwatj07
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@
 
     /**
      * This class implements the GWT serialization of {@link HashMultimap}.
-     * 
+     *
      * @author Jord Sonneveld
      *
